info.author: Giacomo Spettoli
info.description:
Introduction
============

The ``plonetheme.bananaleaf`` package uses the *theming & packaging* features
available in `plone.app.theming`_ to make the theme `bananaleaf`_ easily
available in `Plone 4.1`_.

.. image:: http://svn.plone.org/svn/collective/plonetheme.bananaleaf/trunk/screenshot.png

.. _`bananaleaf`: http://www.freecsstemplates.org/preview/bananaleaf/
.. _`plone.app.theming`: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/plone.app.theming
.. _`Plone 4.1`: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/Plone/4.1rc2

Installation
=============

Add Plone site
---------------------

Install Plone 4.1 with `plone.app.theming`_ and create a Plone site (if you have not already)
with Diazo theming configured.

Zip file
---------------------

If you are an end user, you might enjoy installation via zip file import.

1. Download the zip file: http://svn.plone.org/svn/collective/plonetheme.bananaleaf/trunk/bananaleaf.zip
2. Import the theme from the Diazo theme control panel.

Buildout
---------------------

If you are a developer, you might enjoy installation via buildout.

Add ``plonetheme.bananaleaf`` to your ``plone.recipe.zope2instance`` section's *eggs* parameter e.g.::

    [instance]
    eggs =
        Plone
        plonetheme.bananaleaf

Select theme
---------------------

Select and enable the theme from the Diazo control panel. That's it!

Changelog
=========

1.0 (2011-06-11)
----------------

- Initial release [giacomos]
info.name: plonetheme.bananaleaf
info.summary: An installable Diazo theme for Plone 4.1
